typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		PDT as date,
		{Max TemperatureF} as short,
		{Mean TemperatureF} as short,
		{Min TemperatureF} as short,
		{Max Dew PointF} as short,
		{MeanDew PointF} as short,
		{Min DewpointF} as short,
		{Max Humidity} as short,
		{ Mean Humidity} as short,
		{ Min Humidity} as short,
		{ Max Sea Level PressureIn} as double,
		{ Mean Sea Level PressureIn} as double,
		{ Min Sea Level PressureIn} as double,
		{ Max VisibilityMiles} as short,
		{ Mean VisibilityMiles} as short,
		{ Min VisibilityMiles} as short,
		{ Max Wind SpeedMPH} as short,
		{ Mean Wind SpeedMPH} as short,
		{ Max Gust SpeedMPH} as short,
		PrecipitationIn as string,
		{ CloudCover} as short,
		{ Events} as string,
		{ WindDirDegrees} as short,
		Zip as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	dateFormats: ['MM/dd/yyyy'],
	timestampFormats: ['MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss'],
	preferredIntegralType: 'integer',
	preferredFractionalType: 'double',
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 2)) ~> source1
source1 select(mapColumn(
		PDT,
		{Max TemperatureF},
		{Min TemperatureF},
		{ Mean Humidity},
		{ Mean Wind SpeedMPH},
		{ Max Gust SpeedMPH},
		PrecipitationIn,
		{ CloudCover},
		{ WindDirDegrees},
		Zip
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 aggregate(groupBy(Zip),
	windspeed = avg({ Mean Wind SpeedMPH})) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 sink(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
